title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.13 - Class I saline surface waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 701.13 - Class I saline surface waters

State Regulations

The best usages of Class I waters are secondary contact
recreation and fishing. These waters shall be suitable for fish, shellfish, and
wildlife propagation and survival. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

701.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
